page.title: 04KINGSKERSWELL/CHURCH REPORT
page.content: { A REPORT BY OUR VICAR. 85 people attend our church per week. About 10 people attend church who are up to 10 years old,30 are from 18 to 60 years old and 45 are over 60. The church is involved with lots of other activities like,Sunday school, Mothers union,Mens society,Weekly coffee morning and Whist drive. A typical day spent by our Vicar. {SUNDAYS}Mornings. Our Vicar preaches at Coffinswell then he comes to Kingskerswell to preach. {Most afternoons.} Visiting parishioners at home and in hospital.Business meetings in Parish and Deanery + funerals and interviews. {Most evenings.} Evening prayer and evensong. { {Other days and evenings. Men's socity and choir practice.
